BR_text.BRsummary: Diff and commit messages fail to write out
BR_text.BRdescription:
If the experiment output directory does not exist, NM creates it, but only after trying to store git info there:
 ...
 sh: 1: cannot create experiments/mmmt-delta/git_commit: Directory nonexistent
 sh: 1: cannot create experiments/mmmt-delta/git_diff: Directory nonexistent
 2016-12-29 23:22:57: Initializing TensorBoard summary writer.

comments_1.comment_text:
V <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/commit/df0db10611f0c1c9f4d80480f38fb4ebf46792f7>df0db10</denchmark-link>
  je to opravený - jakou máš verzi? Tohle je už dávno v masteru

comments_2.comment_text: Btw. adresář se vždycky dělá dřív

comments_3.comment_text:
Master mi to porad dela. Jeste dnes, commit <denchmark-link:https://github.com/ufal/neuralmonkey/commit/bec408a546accf2bf705cc6dcccc1334cee915c3>bec408a</denchmark-link>
 .
 sh: 1: cannot create output/git_commit: Directory nonexistent
 sh: 1: cannot create output/git_diff: Directory nonexistent
 2017-01-19 12:33:47: Initializing TensorBoard summary writer.

comments_4.comment_text: odkud to pouštíš relativně k root directory toho package?

comments_5.comment_text: a jak máš nastavenou main.output konfiguraci?

comments_6.comment_text:
Nespoustim to z toho package. To nemuzeme predpokladat.
 Cili to bude duvod.
 Spoustim to prikazem ./muj-odkaz/neuralmonkey/bin/neuralmonkey-train, kde muj-odkaz je symlink na ten repozitar.
 NM by si tedy mela napred udelat nejaky readlink -f na cestu k sobe a tam udelat v subshellu cd a teprve pak volat git.

comments_7.comment_text: Podívej se do kódu, přesně to se tam děje.

comments_8.comment_text: Nepředpokládáme místo, odkud se to volá.

comments_9.comment_text: Napiš ještě,  co máš v konfigu v output v  [main], prosim
